---
title: "Calculate the average color of an image"
author: "Guanhua Chen"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library('imager')

# Load the picture
photo <- load.image()

# Preview the picture loaded
plot(photo)

#calculate the average values of the RGB channels
averageRGB=imsplit(photo,"c") %>% laply(mean)*255
averageRGB

#draw a shade with the average RGB
imfill(20,20,val=c(averageRGB,0,255)) %>% plot


```
